plot: A beautiful young woman struggles to cope with the death of her mother. Her struggles are further complicated when her mother's sister promises to take care of her. Only until they fulfill her mother's final wish will their life begin anew.
title: The Light at the End of the Road
plot_es: A beautiful young woman struggles to cope with the death of her mother. Her struggles are further complicated when her mother's sister promises to take care of her. Only until they fulfill her mother's final wish will their life begin anew.
original_name: The Light at the End of the Road
